title: Natural Gas: Weekly Closing Above $2.548 May Result In Gap-up Opening Ahead
text:
On analysis of the movements of futures, in different time frames, I find that , Natural Gas futures have shown good strength; which looks evident enough for a gap-up opening on the first trading session of the upcoming week. No doubt that the growing pessimism among the traders about Natural Gas, which has constantly been trading in a bearish phase since February 2019; but the Natural Gas futures have given a clear signal about the upcoming bouncing move on September 5th, 2019.

I find that the futures have been constantly struggling to sustain above the level of $2.495, which indicate the thick presence of Natural Gas bulls; who look too aggressive to cross the level of $2.721 during the upcoming week. No doubt that a gap-up opening on the first trading session of the upcoming week will confirm the continuity of an uptrend ahead.

Watch my video on Natural Gas futures below.

Finally, I find that the futures look ready to bounce upward during the month of October 2019. No doubt that the formation of a bullish hammer on September 5th, 219, amid the volatile move, has been confirmed by the follow-up move on September 6th, 2019; will continue to keep the current uptrend intact during the upcoming weeks.
